Error    2    Value of type 'GMap.NET.MapRoute' cannot be converted to 'System.Collections.Generic.List(Of GMap.NET.PointLatLng)'. 

Can you guys help me and tell me what i'm doing wrong.

 

Other thing is it possible to know the name of the street by pointing Lat and Long?

 

Best Regards,

the real defination of function is: 

MapRoute GetRouteBetweenPoints(PointLatLng start, PointLatLng end, bool avoidHighways, int Zoom);

But didn't worked also.

Sorry but i really cant understand it.
